tharuna manthrin gananawak ma sitina athara sandhanaya yatathe tharaga karana ja. ni. pe. nayaka wimal wirawansha, jathika hela urumaya niyojanaya karana amathya patali champika ranawaka wani janatha niyojithayan da dakwiya hakiya.me harunu wita kolambaa disthrikkaya niyojanaya karamin palath sabha manthriwarun wana thilanga sumathipala saha duminda silwa wani tharuna ha janapi්raya deshapalanagnyayan da me mathiwaranayata tharaga kirimata apeksha karayi.mehidi chandadayaka janathawage awadhanayata lakwiya yuthu thawath karanayak gana sandahan kala yuthumaya.
